FuncDef:
The anti-attack udp-flood enable command enables defense against UDP flood attacks.
The anti-attack udp-flood disable command disables defense against UDP flood attacks.
The undo anti-attack udp-flood enable command disables defense against UDP flood attacks. The anti-attack udp-flood enable command enables defense against UDP flood attacks. The anti-attack udp-flood disable command disables defense against UDP flood attacks. The undo anti-attack udp-flood enable command disables defense against UDP flood attacks. By default, defense against UDP flood attacks is enabled.
